conversation.text: Well, well. The rebel child appears.
Aunt Munera. How you have been.
Cut the chat, brat. I've been around a lot longer than you, and I can say that what you're doing right now is pointless and selfish.
It IS so, yes. Look around you! Father provides all this for us. Food, drink, shelter, power... and all he asks in return is a little life force. A small sum to pay, all considered.
Mmhmm. I'll bet you were really sold on the drink part.
Oh, shut up. You're not even old enough to know. What are you, sixteen?
Whatever. Let's get this over with.
